I completely understand how frustrating it must be to deal with a late refund, especially after sharing your concerns already. It's really disheartening when things don't go as expected, and I truly empathize with your situation.

Let’s make sure we get this sorted out for you. Could you please provide me with any details you have about your refund request? This will help me look into it further and find out what’s causing the delay. Thank you for your patience—I’m here to help!

The response is effective in addressing the customer's concern by asking for further details and providing assurance, though it could have included more proactive steps or solutions regarding the refund.
